dict.acceptation: 刺痛；咬饵；有咬（或叮）的习性；（人）上当；
（辣椒，胡椒等）刺激；（齿轮，螺丝，钳子，锚等）咬住；（利器等）刺进；（寒风等）刺骨；
机内测试设备(Built-In Test Equipment)；

sent.orig: Always a bite of rice with a bite of side dishes.
sent.trans: 总是把米饭和菜替着吃。吃一口米饭，再吃一口菜。

sent.orig: Bite-A full complement of white teeth, with a strong, sound scissors bite.
sent.trans: 一口完整的白牙齿，坚固而完美的剪状咬合。

sent.orig: A baker's wife may bite a bun a brewer's wife may bite of a tun.
sent.trans: 面包师的老婆可以吃面包，酿酒师的老婆可以喝大桶——近水楼台先得月。

sent.orig: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sent.trans: 咬合阀盖保护阀远离灰尘和碎片，包括内置咬气门芯。

sent.orig: Brian: Come on, it's just a bite. It doesn't really hurt to have just a bite.
sent.trans: 布莱恩：哎呦，就咬一口嘛，不会影响你减肥的啦。
